titles.title: Guam Excess Land Return Act
Guam Excess Land Return Act
To amend Public Law 106-504 to allow certain land in Guam to be transferred to previous recorded owners of that land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs .

bill.summary:
Guam Excess Land Return Act
This bill allows excess federal lands in Guam to be transferred to the original landowners or their heirs if such prior ownership can be verified in the official records maintained by the government of Guam.
The government of Guam must establish a process for such transfers.
